user_input:
Modify the TJ Sectoral Model. 
Perform a web-search to find how much e-kerosene and e-methanol can be imported into Europe in 2050, in Tj/hr.
Add 2 new Gas Nodes 1 called 'e-kerosene import' and the other 'e-methanol import'. 
Add 2 new Gas Fields 1 called 'e-kerosene import' and the other 'e-methanol import' (when the pipeline gets to adding properties, use the data from the web-search as a dependency)
Add 2 new Gas Pipelines From 'BE01' to 'e-kerosene import' and 'e-methanol import'. Use an unlimited capacity.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the TJ Sectoral Model specifications.

function_args.query: 2050 European import potential of e-kerosene and e-methanol (Tj/hr)

tasks.description: Search the web for 2050 European import potential of e-kerosene and e-methanol (Tj/hr) to use as a dependency for property updates.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', search the web for the specified import potential.
Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a Gas Node named 'e-kerosene import'.
Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a Gas Node named 'e-methanol import'.
Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a Gas Field named 'e-kerosene import'.
Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a Gas Field named 'e-methanol import'.

tasks.description: Update properties/attributes for Gas Field 'e-kerosene import' using the Tj/hr value from the web-search.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update properties for Gas Field 'e-kerosene import' with web-search results.

tasks.description: Update properties/attributes for Gas Field 'e-methanol import' using the Tj/hr value from the web-search.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update properties for Gas Field 'e-methanol import' with web-search results.

tasks.description: Create Gas Pipeline from 'BE01' to 'e-kerosene import'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a Gas Pipeline from 'BE01' to 'e-kerosene import'.

tasks.description: Update capacity property of the Gas Pipeline from 'BE01' to 'e-kerosene import' to unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update the capacity of the Gas Pipeline from 'BE01' to 'e-kerosene import' to unlimited.

tasks.description: Create Gas Pipeline from 'BE01' to 'e-methanol import'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a Gas Pipeline from 'BE01' to 'e-methanol import'.

tasks.description: Update capacity property of the Gas Pipeline from 'BE01' to 'e-methanol import' to unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', update the capacity of the Gas Pipeline from 'BE01' to 'e-methanol import' to unlimited.
